title: We Want Justice. We Want Consequences.
itunes:title: We Want Justice. We Want Consequences.
description:
This is a show about the things we buy and buy into, and as long as there is violence against BIPOC bodies, we’re buying into taking action to prevent it. So this week we’re talking about Daunte Wright –– what happened, how we feel, and resources to learn and take action. And yes, we’re also talking about the things we bought.

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

For a list and links to all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 


Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: Sponsor Links
